content.body: Where can I find documentation on the difference between `?` and `!` in ecmarkup spec text?  I don't see it mentioned on https://tc39.es/ecmarkup/
content.formatted_body: Where can I find documentation on the difference between ? and ! in ecmarkup spec text? I don't see it mentioned on https://tc39.es/ecmarkup/

content.body: It's in the notational conventions section of the spec itself
